method.name: check_update_latest
method.tp:docstring:
Treat URL as a repository with multiple updates. We expect to find a text file with one URL per line at the given URL. We will treat the lines in reverse order, starting with the latest, and do a check_update on each. We'll report back on the first update found that is either 'up-to-date' or 'can-upgrade'. If all are 'cannot-upgrade', we return 'cannot-upgrade'.
Report back on latest applicable update, if any.
